CommandDefinition.Name: setdomaintypespecificdata
CommandDefinition.Description: Assigns the type specific data to the specified domain.
CommandDefinition.ExtendedDescription: Known type parameter: RADIUS: ordertype - ordertype of the authentification order. server - one or more RADIUS servers in the form <IPv4/IPv6>,<Port>,<PresharedKey> LDAP ordertype - ordertype of the authentification order. workspace - workspace the ordertype should be executed in application - application the ordertype should be executed in version - version the ordertype should be executed in server - one or more LDAP servers in the form <Hostname>,<Port> followed by optional SSLParameter ,<keystorePath>,<keystoreType> and an optional ,<passphrase> if the trustStoreData is not located in the same keystorePath a specific trustStore can be specified (keystore passphrase is not optional in those cases (',,' for no passphrase)) with the parameters <truststorePath>,<truststoreType>,<passphrase>

Argument.Name: domainName
Argument.Description: The domain for which the information will be set

Argument.Name: domainTypeSpecificData
Argument.Description: The type specific data as key value pairs (entered as key=value)
